episodes.title: Does Jehovah God's Anger Last Forever? |Scripture Sunday EP 5
episodes.description:
Hello, Brothers & Sisters!

EP 5 of Scripture Sunday and today we're taking apart a few scriptures that contradict each other. 

Does God hate forever or forgive?

LINKS:
If you can support my Patreon account (it allows me to keep making videos for you!) It would mean the world to me for your support. 

https://www.patreon.com/kameronfader

Free PDF On How to ask JW's, Mormons, & Christians without coming off as angry and a 3 question survey. 
https://www.towershillmedia.com/ssep5

Each week, I'm going to release a short video that focuses on one scripture from the Bible and shows how and why I started questioning the Bible as a whole. This will be In addition to my regular videos. 

The reason's why I started questioning its validity is because I haven't found any Christians that can answer the absurdity that is the Bible or why modern religions are so different from the bizarre book today. 

If you still believe or think the Bible has all the answers, this is not for you. This video requires an open mind. 

Like many of you, I was born & raised into a Cult disguised as a religion. Once I found out it was okay to celebrate holidays, I began to look up the reasoning and use my brain finally to think critically.

Would appreciate a moment of your time to sign up for my future email newsletter and help the direction of the YouTube channel in exchange for a PDF goodie. Thank you!

Feel free to use it, but giving me some credit for making it would be nice :)

4 things JW's do that are Pagan
https://youtu.be/rIPMkdF1Apo

Whether you came out of Jehovah's Witness Cult, Mormonism Cult, Scientology, or SO MANY OTHERS. This is for you. 

Once you're free from a Cult posing as a religion, you're free to discover yourself. A movement is starting for those of us to be proud of what we survived and we MADE IT OUT ALIVE.

I was born and raised in the Cult of JW's and left a little over a year ago from the thought control.

Stalk me (in a non-creepy way please):

Instagram: https://goo.gl/swbNyV

episodes.title: Does The Bible Contradict Itself?
episodes.description:
Hello, Brothers & Sisters!

Like many of you, I was born & raised into a Cult disguised as a religion. Once I found out they were a malicious, vindictive, corporation I couldn't go back. Unfortunately, they kept all my friends and family that do not speak to me to this day. Company policy.

Afterward, I went looking for true Christianity. I felt that maybe God had awoken me to the true word of Christ. 

This is what I found. The real "truth".

I wouldn't recommend watching this if you aren't open to opposing views other than yours. This needs an open mind. 

Once I found out the Jehovah's Witnesses had lied to me my entire life, I went searching the Bible for more answers as well as Chrisitan churches. 

To this day they haven't answered my questions. The same questions my old Bible studies used to ask me, I'd ask them to no avail. 

This is what happened. 

3 question Survey & Free 10 Question PDF 
https://www.towershillmedia.com/10bc

Would appreciate a moment of your time to answer the 3 question survey to help the direction of the YouTube channel in exchange for a PDF goodie. Thank you!

Feel free to use it, but giving me some credit for making it would be nice :)

Coming soon, my Patreon Account!


Whether you came out of Jehovah's Witness Cult, Mormonism Cult, Scientology, or SO MANY OTHERS. This is for you. 

Once you're free from a Cult posing as a religion, you're free to discover yourself. A movement is starting for those of us to be proud of what we survived and we MADE IT OUT ALIVE.

I was born and raised in the Cult of JW's and left a little over a year ago from the thought control.

episodes.description:
Hello, Brothers & Sisters! Kameron here. Today, I finally share thoughts and feelings from the 2018 Memorial of Jehovah's Witnesses. My first meeting/memorial in a few years. I really felt messed up after seeing it from new eyes. It also messed me up. 

I reached out to a few other activists and we started noticing a lot of similarities in our symptoms. 

I was born and raised in the Cult of JW's and left a little over a year ago from the thought control.

episodes.title: 4 Things Jehovah's Witnesses Do That Are Pagan
episodes.description:
Hello, Brothers & Sisters! Kameron here. Today, we look at 4 common practices of the Jehovah's Witnesses that are Pagan. 

I was born and raised in the Cult of JW's and left a little over a year ago from the thought control. 

LINKS:
1. Wedding Rings/white dresses/wedding cake
 Watcthower has chosen to look the other way despite these being Pagan.
 Watchtower has admitted wedding rings are pagan, but claims that is not important.
 Revelation, It's Grand Climax chap.33 p.236 
 
 From https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/quotes/pagan-practices.php
 
 http://jwsurvey.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/revelation-1988.pdf
 
2. Neck Ties
Has roots in Roman Military and Pagan origins 
http://www.tie-a-tie.net/the-evolution-of-the-necktie/
 
3. Baby Showers
Google Baby shower's. It's a pre birthday-birthday that has a TON of ties to non Biblical cultures. 
 
4. Dissfellowshiping/Excommunication/Shunning/Isolation/
(excommunication) and shunning was introduced in its current format in the 1940/50s. This is despite the 1947 Awake! explaining the pagan origins of this practice.
 Awake 1947 Jan 8 p.27 
 "The Encyclopaedia Britannica says that papal excommunication is not without pagan influence, "and its variations cannot be adequately explained unless account be taken of several non-Christian analogues of excommunication." The superstitious Greeks believed that when an excommunicated person died the Devil entered the body, and therefore, "in order to prevent it, the relatives of the deceased cut his body in pieces and boil them in wine." Even the Druids had a method of expelling those who lost faith in their religious superstitions. It was therefore after Catholicism adopted its pagan practices, A.D. 325, that this new chapter in religious excommunication was written."
 
 http://ia601406.us.archive.org/23/items/WatchtowerLibrary/magazines/g/g1947_E.pdf
 
 From https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/quotes/pagan-practices.php

Stalk me (in a non-creepy way please):

Instagram: https://goo.gl/swbNyV

https://youtu.be/mQA8rC81jfI

https://youtu.be/PRuCSUfaxqw

https://youtu.be/JN2FN1h6kuA

How to Recover after leaving:

episodes.title: Ex Jehovah's Witness Shunned by Mother VLOG 4
episodes.description:
A natural disaster happened recently and it made the opportunity for my mother to speak to me briefly. She started communicating with me and I reached out back to her. 

My last search for my family vlog: https://youtu.be/3Qh7ZXixl18

My name is Kameron and I've been Dissfellowshipped for a few years for falling in love with a girl. I began picking up my Bible this year, reading it to return to Jehovah, but something else happened. I started to realize the questions I had as a child were very good and real questions to ask. I began to awaken.

In fact, by reading the New World Translation, NIV KJ and more I realized that a lot of points the Jehovah's Witnesses make were not backed by the Bible and in many situations were very cruel. 

Scriptures on disfellowshiping that have been misused. 
1 Cor. 5:11 - 13

2  John 1: 9 -11

The act of disfellowshipping is not scriptural. The word  disfellowship isn't even in the bible. 

In Fact, Jesus did not say to shun the unrepentant wrongdoer,

but to treat them as a tax collector, which he himself spoke to 

and ate with -  Matthew 9:11.


I began my search for the few blood family members I have left. Mainly my Mother and her Sister. I have a few cousins I'd love to reach out to, too. 

Whether this turns out amazing or not, I feel it's important to share
my experience with you. As painful as it may be, I wasn't going to do it. But, I've decided to share this very personal part of my life with you. Hopefully it can help you cope, not feel alone and see life gets better...or not have to deal with this at all.

Stalk me (in a non creepy way please):

Instagram: https://goo.gl/swbNyV

5 Ways to Find Yourself After Leaving Your Faith:
https://youtu.be/mQA8rC81jfI

Why I left Video:
https://youtu.be/PRuCSUfaxqw

Reasons' Why I Won't Go Back:
https://youtu.be/JN2FN1h6kuA

How to Recover after leaving:
https://youtu.be/NxmYScCtyiQ

How to make friends after leaving:
https://youtu.be/Ju9Wufc5BMw


Look back and bring someone  along :)

Please support him and check out his amazing music at: http://chriszabriskie.com/

episodes.title: Leaving Jehovah's Witnesses, Unanswered Questions, Looking Back and Looking Ahead
episodes.description:
My name is Kameron and this is how I left Jehovah's Witnesses (an abridged version).
I could go on and on about all the things that led to leaving my faith

I've always had questions that were never answered and I'm going to do something about that. Write a letter to the Society, that'll be an interesting update in the future. 

This video is not made to persuade you to leave JW's, just provide another perspective on why I left. Looking back, for the most part, I do not hate JW's. 85% of them really mean well and believe. The top 10-5% I am now realizing are smart enough to know better about the religion as a whole.

I made this to focus on the positive and how you can still grow as a person after having devoted a huge portion of your life to a faith with nothing to show for it. 

Stalk me (in a non creepy way please):

Instagram: https://goo.gl/swbNyV

Hang in there...life gets better :)

Music CGI Snake by Chris Zabriskie 

Please support him and check out his amazing music at: http://chriszabriskie.com/

episodes.title: How to Recover After Leaving Your Faith. Especially if You're One of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
If you have or are thinking of leaving your faith, you may go through a lot of mental and emotional stress. This video is made to show you the positive and how you can be happy. I did not make this video to encourage you to leave your faith. If you're happy with your faith, then please, stay in it!

My name is Kameron and I am an ex Jehovah's Witness. I do not consider myself an Apostate. However, I do know that titles are given and not taken.

 I went through lot of stress and noticed when I spoke to other ex JW's or people who had left their faith/dissfellowship/excommunicated all had similar issues. 

I made this to focus on the positive and how you can still grow as a person after having devoted a huge portion of your life to a faith with nothing to show for it. 

Hang in there...life gets better :)

Stalk me (in a non creepy way please):

Instagram: https://goo.gl/swbNyV

Music Everybody's Got Problems That Aren't Mine by Chris Zabriskie 
Please support him and check out his amazing music at: http://chriszabriskie.com/
